name: iQQ Default Client (CLI001)

values.description: Default Client - Maps to CLI001. Get from: terraform output -json cognito_partner_clients | jq -r '.default.client_id'
Get from: terraform output -json cognito_partner_client_secrets | jq -r '.default'
Default API Key - Tagged with clientId=CLI001. Get from: terraform output -raw default_api_key_value
Business Client ID (automatically extracted from API key)

description:
Default client environment with CLI001 preferences:
- Blocks APCO Insurance
- Max 2 providers
- Expected result: 2 quotes (Client Direct, Route66)

IMPORTANT: This is a template file. Copy to postman-environment-default.json and fill in the credentials.
